resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/107084</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>107084</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765087666</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Learning Objects Repository Software</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erlernennachrichten Behälter-Software</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Logiciel D'Étude de Dépôt d'Objets</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Software De Aprendizagem Do Repositório Dos 
Objetos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Software Imparante Del Deposito Degli Oggetti</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Λογισμικό αποθηκών αντικειμένων εκμάθησης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Software Del Depósito De los Objetos Que aprende</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An online database of learning content that provides software to Commonweath countries free of charge. Institutions or governments can establish a shared repository by accessing free open source software from COL's LOR.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Onlinedatenbank des erlerneninhalts, der 
Software zu den Commonweath Ländern kostenlos zur Verfügung stellt. 
Anstalten oder Regierungen können einen geteilten Behälter 
herstellen, indem sie frei auf geöffnete Quellsoftware von COL's LOR 
zugreifen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une base de données en ligne du contenu d'étude 
qui fournit le logiciel aux pays de Commonweath gratuitement. 
Les établissements ou les gouvernements peuvent établir un 
dépôt partagé en accédant librement au logiciel ouvert de source 
de COL's LOR.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma base de dados em linha do índice de 
aprendizagem que fornece o software aos países de Commonweath livres 
da carga. As instituições ou os governos podem estabelecer um 
repositório compartilhado alcançando livre o software aberto da 
fonte de COL's LOR.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una base di dati in linea del soddisfare imparante
che fornisce il software ai paesi di Commonweath gratis. Le 
istituzioni o i governi possono stabilire un deposito comune accedendo
liberamente al software aperto di sorgente da COL's LOR.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια σε απευθείας σύνδεση βάση δεδομένων της εκμάθησης
του περιεχομένου που παρέχει το λογισμικό στις χώρες 
Commonweath δωρεάν. Τα όργανα ή οι κυβερνήσεις 
μπορούν να καθιερώσουν μια κοινή αποθήκη με την πρόσβαση του 
ελεύθερου ανοικτού λογισμικού πηγής από LOR του ΣΥΝΤΑΓΜΑΤΑΡΧΗ.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una base de datos en línea del contenido que 
aprende que proporciona a software a los países de Commonweath 
gratuitamente. Las instituciones o los gobiernos pueden 
establecer un depósito compartido teniendo acceso libremente a 
software abierto de la fuente de COL's LOR.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765087666</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>107084</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/matters/learning-objects-repository-software</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
